short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables dark theme on all websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Very small and lightweight extension that enables nice dark mode for all websites. It even darkens the images! Makes it easier to browse the web at night.
